catched() - Method in interface domain.interfaces.Catchable
 
checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(Collisionable, Collisionable) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if two Collisionable objects intersects.
checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(Collisionable, Action) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if an Action executed by a Collisionable has collisioned with any Collisionable instance from the collisionables ArrayList.
checkCollisionableIntersectionCollision(Collisionable, Collisions.CollisionDirection, Collisionable) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if a Collisionable wich is moving in a direction collisionate with another.
checkCollisionableIntersectionPrecisionCollision(Collisionable, Collisionable) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if any of the collisionable1 collisionableAreas intersects any of the collisionable2 collisionableAreas.
checkCollisionableIntersectionPrecisionCollision(Collisionable, Collisions.CollisionDirection, Collisionable) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if any of the collisionable1 collisionableAreas intersects any of the collisionable2 collisionableAreas at a specified direction.
checkCollisionableTileCollision(Collisionable, Action, Tile) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if an Action executed by a Collisionable has collisioned with any Collisionable instance within the Tile tile.
checkPointCollision(Collisionable, Point) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if a Collisionable contains a Point at his collisionableArea.
checkPointCollision(Point) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if any of the collisionable instances contains the passed Point.
checkPointCollision(Point, Collisions.CollisionDirection, Point) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if an end point is going away at a specified direction.
checkScenarioCollisionableAreasCollision(Collisionable, Collisions.CollisionDirection, Scenario) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method is used to check if a Collisionable instance is collisioning with any Scenario instance collisionableAreas.
checkScenarioFallingCollisionPlatformGame(Collisionable, Scenario) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method is used to detect if there's ground down the collisionable.
checkScenarioLimitsCollision(Collisionable, Collisions.CollisionDirection, Scenario) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method is used to check if a Collisionable instance is collisionating with a Scenario instance limits.
checkSurfaceCollisionablesCollision(Rectangle, Collisions.CollisionDirection, Rectangle) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method is used to check if a Rectangle surface collisionates with with the opposite from another Rectangle.
checkTileCollision(Tile) - Static method in class domain.Collisions
This method checks if a Tile object is occupied or not by a Collisionable.

clipPlayer - Variable in class domain.Sprite
A ClipPlayer wich is the responsible of playing AudioClip instances.
Collisionable - Interface in domain.interfaces
This interface defines the model that a collisionable game entity should have to get its collisions managed by the Collisions class.
collisionableAreas - Variable in class domain.Sprite
This field holds additional Rectangle instances wich can be used to detect a more accurated collisions or simply to determine any collisionable area for the Sprite instance.
Collisions - Class in domain
This utility class implements methods for detecting collisions, detecting Collisionable instances in determinated areas, detecting visible Collisionable instances for a determinated Collisionable, etc.
Collisions.CollisionDirection - Enum in domain
Enumeration containing possible collision directions, where the ANY value can be used to specify all of them.
Collisions.CollisionType - Enum in domain
Enumeration containing various generic collision types
Configuration - Class in domain
This class holds all the configuration managers for the GameClient instance.
control - package control
 
control.interfaces - package control.interfaces
 
Controls - Class in domain
This class acts as the controls manager. it's the responsible of mapping the FiredAction from the FiredActionable instances of the Environment to the Events received from the GameEngine.
